abstract: Commerce Dept reports new home sales climbed 6.8 percent in April 2015 to seasonally adjusted annual rate of 517,000; follows 10 percent dip in March.
lead_paragraph: The Commerce Department said new home sales climbed 6.8 percent last month, after a 10 percent dip in March.

headline.main: New Home Sales Increased 6% in April After Decline in March
headline.print_headline: New Home Sales Rose 6.8%. in April After Decline in March

snippet: The Commerce Department said new home sales climbed 6.8 percent last month, after a 10 percent dip in March.
